articles.title: Twitter loses nearly half advertising revenue since Elon Musk takeover - BBC
articles.description: Elon Musk confirms the firm has a heavy debt load and income in June was not what had been expected.
articles.content:
Twitter has lost almost half of its advertising revenue since it was bought by Elon Musk for $44 billion (£33.6bn) last October, its owner has revealed.
He said the company had not seen the increase… [+1893 chars]

articles.author: John James
articles.title: How much caffeine is in YOUR child's favourite energy drink? - Daily Mail
articles.description: EXCLUSIVE: Energy drinks like Rockstar, PRIME energy and Monster all possess between 160-200mg of caffeine per 500ml - double the amounts found in a cup of coffee.
articles.content:
Britain's schoolchildren may be consuming potentially dangerous levels of caffeine on a daily basis if they are regularly drinking popular energy drinks, MailOnline can reveal.

articles.title: The pleasure and the perils of loving an AI girlfriend - The Telegraph
articles.description: Millions of (mostly) men are carrying out relationships with a chatbot partner – but it’s not all love and happiness
articles.content:
Turkle says that even the primitive chatbots of more than a decade ago appealed to those who had struggled with relationships.
Its been consistent in the research from when the AI was simple, to now… [+7275 chars]
